name: Square Shuffle
description:
Welcome to our first game, Square Shuffle! 

This is a turn - based puzzle game that includes several different types of blocks that the player can interact with and enemies that want to kill you. 

The controls are WASD for the player. The player's goal is to get to the portal at the end of each level before the enemies can stop you. 

The player can interact with blocks by pushing on them, or walking into them. Green blocks move one tile, ice blocks slide until they hit a surface, and locked blocks are unmovable. 

You can fight back against the pesky enemies by crushing them between two surfaces! That's all, and Good Luck!
